sentences.en: The American squad has pulled out of the four-day basketball tournament.
sentences.cn: 美国运动代表队已经退出了为期4天的篮球锦标赛。

sentences.en: The four-day festival ended a day early after an outbreak of violence involving hundreds of youths.
sentences.cn: 由于一起数百名年轻人参与的暴力事件的爆发，为期4天的庆祝活动提前1天结束。

sentences.en: Not long ago, researches learned that four-day olds could understand addition and subtraction.
sentences.cn: 不久前，研究人员发现4天大的婴儿能够理解加减法。
